name: arcwar_spawn_02
text: Zet is the Self, and the Self is Zet.
text_simple: zet is the self and the self is zet

name: arcwar_spawn_03
text: The Self seeks to end the great schism.
text_simple: the self seeks to end the great schism

name: arcwar_spawn_04
text: Matter has been split from its intended form. These must be made to unite.
text_simple: matter has been split from its intended form these must be made to unite

name: arcwar_spawn_06
text: Self units with Radiant self. For now.
text_simple: self units with radiant self for now

name: arcwar_spawn_08
text: Self bonds with Dire Self. For the moment.
text_simple: self bonds with dire self for the moment

name: arcwar_battlebegins_01
text: This disharmony must resolve, or be crushed.
text_simple: this disharmony must resolve or be crushed

name: arcwar_battlebegins_02
text: Diruulth and Radinthul, your conflict must be ended.
text_simple: diruulth and radinthul your conflict must be ended

name: arcwar_battlebegins_03
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: arcwar_battlebegins_04
text: The destruction of the Ancients begins.
text_simple: the destruction of the ancients begins

name: arcwar_battlebegins_06
text: Their Ancient must shatter and burn.
text_simple: their ancient must shatter and burn

name: arcwar_battlebegins_08
text: Great upheaval shall lay their Ancient to waste.
text_simple: great upheaval shall lay their ancient to waste

name: arcwar_firstblood_02
text: First blood. And so the Great Unification commences.
text_simple: first blood and so the great unification commences

name: arcwar_firstblood_03
text: The Dire have shed first blood.
text_simple: the dire have shed first blood

name: arcwar_firstblood_04
text: The first blood of the Radiant is shed.
text_simple: the first blood of the radiant is shed

text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

text: Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.

text: Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
text_simple: hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm

name: arcwar_kill_03
text: Mercy is yours, for the end comes.
text_simple: mercy is yours for the end comes

name: arcwar_kill_07
text: No one to blame but yourself.
text_simple: no one to blame but yourself

name: arcwar_kill_08
text: You are now the ward of death itself.
text_simple: you are now the ward of death itself

name: arcwar_kill_09
text: You meet your true self at last.
text_simple: you meet your true self at last

name: arcwar_kill_11
text: Life is prison. You are free.
text_simple: life is prison you are free

name: arcwar_kill_12
text: You will just have to accept this, and move on.
text_simple: you will just have to accept this and move on
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A grandmaster hero chat wheel was used

name: arcwar_kill_17
text: Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm!
text_simple: hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm

name: arcwar_kill_22
text: All that is green returns to dust.
text_simple: all that is green returns to dust

name: arcwar_kill_24
text: Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm.
text_simple: hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm

name: arcwar_rival_04
text: Perhaps death will put you in a better mood.
text_simple: perhaps death will put you in a better mood

name: arcwar_rival_05
text: You do not have to be mad.
text_simple: you do not have to be mad
pretty_criteria: Killing Troll Warlord (20% chance)|A master hero chat wheel was used

name: arcwar_rival_07
text: The last of your light is cast.
text_simple: the last of your light is cast
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: arcwar_rival_08
text: In all things you were. In nothing you become.
text_simple: in all things you were in nothing you become

name: arcwar_rival_10
text: May your disunity end with you.
text_simple: may your disunity end with you

name: arcwar_rival_11
text: It seems time has finally caught up to you.
text_simple: it seems time has finally caught up to you

name: arcwar_rival_14
text: Flame is no match for the Arc.
text_simple: flame is no match for the arc
criteria: Kill Isarc_warden IsEnemyLina Chance_20%|Kill Isarc_warden IsEnemyEmber_Spirit Chance_20%
pretty_criteria: Killing Lina (20% chance)|Killing Ember Spirit (20% chance)

name: arcwar_rival_18
text: You meddle with powers you cannot comprehend.
text_simple: you meddle with powers you cannot comprehend

name: arcwar_rival_19
text: For all your claims, you are still a fool.
text_simple: for all your claims you are still a fool

name: arcwar_rival_22
text: Self knows what you once were.
text_simple: self knows what you once were

name: arcwar_ally_01
text: Titan, let us unify what has been torn apart.
text_simple: titan let us unify what has been torn apart

name: arcwar_ally_02
text: The aid of a Fundamental is most welcome.
text_simple: the aid of a fundamental is most welcome

name: arcwar_ally_03
text: Phoenix, your light glittered from afar as Self traveled the cosmos.
text_simple: phoenix your light glittered from afar as self traveled the cosmos

name: arcwar_ally_04
text: Timeless One, perhaps the end finally draws nigh.
text_simple: timeless one perhaps the end finally draws nigh

name: arcwar_death_02
pretty_criteria: Dying|A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: arcwar_death_06
text: The Self has lost its Self.
text_simple: the self has lost its self

name: arcwar_death_08
text: You know not what you do.
text_simple: you know not what you do

name: arcwar_fastres_01
text: Life is a cycle that knows no end.
text_simple: life is a cycle that knows no end

name: arcwar_fastres_03
text: The Self shall radiate back to life.
text_simple: the self shall radiate back to life

name: arcwar_respawn_01
text: Victory walks upon a wire. The Self must not fail.
text_simple: victory walks upon a wire the self must not fail

name: arcwar_respawn_02
text: These fools must learn what they stand against.
text_simple: these fools must learn what they stand against

name: arcwar_respawn_03
text: Such life is and can be when it is given by a foe.
text_simple: such life is and can be when it is given by a foe

name: arcwar_respawn_04
text: One divided against its Self cannot stand.
text_simple: one divided against its self cannot stand

name: arcwar_respawn_06
text: What was none, becomes one again.
text_simple: what was none becomes one again

name: arcwar_respawn_07
text: The Self is because it believes it is.
text_simple: the self is because it believes it is

name: arcwar_items_02
text: This will change the course of battle.
text_simple: this will change the course of battle

name: arcwar_items_03
text: What was paid with gold, the Dire shall pay with lives.
text_simple: what was paid with gold the dire shall pay with lives

name: arcwar_items_04
text: The Radiant shall regret this turn.

text: Selves are in agreement: this one is in the bag.

name: arcwar_win_02

name: arcwar_win_03
text: The Dire has gone down in flames.
text_simple: the dire has gone down in flames

name: arcwar_win_04
text: The Dire are no more. Yet there is still much to be done.
text_simple: the dire are no more yet there is still much to be done

name: arcwar_win_06
text: The Radiant are ended. Yet this is not over.

name: arcwar_rare_01
text: From the Primordial Consciousness all came. Return to it, all must.
text_simple: from the primordial consciousness all came return to it all must

name: arcwar_rare_02
text: It is not to aid the Ancients that this war is joined, but to destroy them both. This disunity must end.
text_simple: it is not to aid the ancients that this war is joined but to destroy them both this disunity must end

name: arcwar_rare_03
text: There can be no hesitation. Dire must be extinguished just as the Radiant.
text_simple: there can be no hesitation dire must be extinguished just as the radiant

name: arcwar_rare_04
text: Radiant aids its enemy, but does not yet know it.
text_simple: radiant aids its enemy but does not yet know it
